title: You know guys, bronze does have to exist.
body:
Let us compare the elo divisions to society. Not everyone in this world can be rich; there aren't enough resources, not enough land, etc. Think of it like the caste system...

Bronze-silver: Peasantry
Gold-Plat: Borgeouise
Diamond: Noble Men
Masters: Aristocrats, semi-royalty
Challenger: Royalty (The king)

It should be straight forward guys. There has to be peasants in this world cause theres just not enough for everyone sry xD
